concept.title: MDITA
concept.shortdesc: MDITA is the authoring format of LwDITA that uses Markdown to structure information.

conbody.p: LwDITA includes two profiles for authoring MDITA topics:

dlentry.dd: Aligns with the GitHub Flavored Markdown spec and includes markup common to most Markdown flavors.
Relies upon features only available in specific flavors of Markdown to enable a more consistent DITA-like experience.
